page.title: 04Iddesleigh Clubs (cont)
page.content: Members must wear a blue ribbon; failure to do so means a fine of sixpence (old money). The dinner is followed by an afternoon of sports and a tea. In Iddesleigh there is a youth club entitled 'The Christian Coffee Bar' which is held in the village hall weekly, each Friday evening. It is organised by members of the Methodist Chapel for all young people over 11 years of age. Iddesleigh also has a Womens' Institute which meets each month in the village hall. Membership is around 20. Dowland is joined with the neighbouring large village of Dolton to form the 'Dolton & Dowland WI' which meets once a month in the village hall at Dolton; membership being around 30 (approx 6 members coming from Dowland).
